course_title: Introduction to Probability and Statistics with Inference
course_description: Basic concepts in counting, probability, hypothesis testing, linear regression and correlation, ANOVA, plus several nonparametric models. Statistical analysis using both R and Excel will also be addressed. Calculator is required. The class consists of lectures and a weekly lab.
